value:
My ideal match? I haven't given it
much thought... If I had to say, it
would be someone I love, of course.

This outfit is so embarrassing. Are
women usually OK with getting
married in a getup like this?

Feeling tired? Let me know if I can do
anything, $Nu.$k$pI know I'm not exactly the relaxed
type, but...

Think this dress is going to keep me
off the battlefield? Think again!
I'm as fierce a fighter as I ever was—$k$pYeah, I can see that you get it.

Ugh... This dress is so restrictive!
Hey, don't look at me! I didn't pick
it out.

This dress? Don't ask! Forget you
saw anything! Oh, right. Hi from
$Nf!

Wow, I'm doing great! Maybe I'll
keep wearing this thing...

Never thought much about being
a bride, but I did train for battle!

I can't concentrate when
I'm dressed like this!

Look! With this power, I can—
Actually, don't look. This dress...

My name is Lyn, and I swear there's
a reason I'm in this getup, but...
Let's not focus on the dress, OK?

Oh, sorry. I was staring at you. You
just remind me of someone I know,
$Nu.$k$pMy husband? You're kidding, right?$k$pNo, another tactician. We helped
each other out, and we traveled a
long way together...$k$pThat friendship means a lot to me.$k$pI'm not sure if you're that much alike,
but spending time with you does
make me happy.$k$pIf you feel the same, I hope we're
never separated...$k$pThat sounds like a proposal? Of
course it isn't! Why would you even
think that?
はいっ！
よいしょ
いやぁっ！
Nooo!
Seriously?
This dress wasn't my idea!
I want my sword back!
What are you looking at?!
Not like this...
Heehee
I'll protect you.
Always at your side.
I know. I know. I know! This really doesn't suit me.
This dress will be the end of me.
I hope you don't find this whole thing funny.
I wonder if my grandfather would be happy to see me like this...
I would never marry someone who couldn't stand at my side in battle. Hey! Let's spar.
All right.
Here we go.
Try my best.
